actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for duty-free treatment of oxidized polyacrylonitrile fibers.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant duty-free treatment to acrylic or modacrylic: oxidized polyacrylonitrile fibers. Provides for a staged rate reduction for such item.

titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for duty-free treatment of oxidized polyacrylonitrile fibers.
